name: A Mind Iced Over
description:
You wake up in an icy castle with no knowledge of  where or who you are. Collect clues and try to regain your memory while trying to figure out your purpose for being here.

Thank you so much! This is my very first visual novel, and I hope to make many more in the future.

Programs and extra assets used:

Programs used: Tyranobuilder, Gimp

Music: "Hope" and "Dramatic Boi" by Patat0Master

GUI: "Tyranobuilder Visual Novel GUI pack #2 Color-blue" by Strikeworks and Kuusou-Kyokusen

Backgrounds: "Ice Queen Palace" backgrounds by Rachel Chen

Font: "Spooky" font by Neat Things
